languages.text: [Сделать вид, что тянетесь за вторым оружием] "Раз не боишься смерти, выбирай, какой рукой тебя убить? Правой или левой?"
[Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"
languages.original_text: [Сделать вид, что тянетесь за вторым оружием] "Раз не боишься смерти, выбирай, какой рукой тебя убить? Правой или левой?"

traits.locale_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or my left one?"
[Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or my left one?"

[Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

languages.text: [Scheinbar nach zweiter Waffe greifen] "Nachdem Ihr keine Angst vor dem Tod habt, dürft Ihr wählen. Soll ich Euch mit meiner rechten oder linken Hand töten?"
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

traits.locale_text: [Scheinbar nach zweiter Waffe greifen] "Nachdem Ihr keine Angst vor dem Tod habt, dürft Ihr wählen. Soll ich Euch mit meiner rechten oder linken Hand töten?"

languages.text: [Faire semblant de dégainer une seconde arme] « Puisque la mort ne vous fait pas peur, je vous laisse le choix : souhaitez-vous mourir de ma main droite ou de ma main gauche ? »
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

traits.locale_text: [Faire semblant de dégainer une seconde arme] « Puisque la mort ne vous fait pas peur, je vous laisse le choix : souhaitez-vous mourir de ma main droite ou de ma main gauche ? »

languages.text: [Fingir que preparas una segunda arma] «Puesto que no tienes miedo a morir, te daré a elegir. ¿Te mato con la mano derecha o con la izquierda?».
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

traits.locale_text: [Fingir que preparas una segunda arma] «Puesto que no tienes miedo a morir, te daré a elegir. ¿Te mato con la mano derecha o con la izquierda?».

languages.text: [サブ武器に手を伸ばすふりをする]「死を恐れていないというのなら、選ばせてやろう。右手で殺されたいか？それとも左手がいいか？」
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

traits.locale_text: [サブ武器に手を伸ばすふりをする]「死を恐れていないというのなら、選ばせてやろう。右手で殺されたいか？それとも左手がいいか？」

languages.text: [假装伸手去拿另一把武器]“既然你这么不怕死，那我就给你个选择。你想让我用右手杀你，还是用左手杀你？”
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"

traits.locale_text: [假装伸手去拿另一把武器]“既然你这么不怕死，那我就给你个选择。你想让我用右手杀你，还是用左手杀你？”

languages.text: [İkinci bir silaha ulaşmaya çalışır gibi davran] "Ölmekten korkmadığına göre sana seçme şansı sunacağım. Seni sağ elimle mi öldüreyim yoksa sol elimle mi?"
languages.original_text: [Pretend to reach for a second weapon] "Since you are not afraid of dying, I will give you a choice. Do I kill you with my right hand or with my left?"
